article_title: Eighteen Alleged Gang Members Arrested in Brooklyn ‘Terror Wave’
article_text:
A father talking to his son inside a Brooklyn courtyard. A woman going grocery shopping. Three people at a Memorial Day barbecue.

These were among the victims shot by 18 alleged gang members responsible for a “wave of terror” in the city, according to Brooklyn District Attorney Kenneth Thompson, who charged the defendants in a wide-ranging, 76-count indictment Wednesday.

The members of the Folk Nation street gang face...
